name: Virtualizing the Home Gateway
tagline: a step to home gateway virtualization backed by NFV
body:
### About this project
Virtualizing network functions is becoming a major trend in todayâ€™s research on cloud computing. Among networking elements, the Home Gateway appears to be one with the most diverse functions to handle and thus, with great potential for virtualization.

### an OSGi module on the gateway to open the gates to NFV migration.

The SvNF module deployed on the HG works as an HTTP proxy. When it receives a request for a file or a response from a server, it analyses them using a set of rules deployed on the HG.
